long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ğŸª§Beezy is now available in PDF version!ğŸª§

It can easily help you parse PDF files, allowing you to quickly search for any information within the documents. Its main features include:

ğŸ’¬ Chat-style reading experience: Through the chat interface, you can communicate with your PDF files as if you were having a conversation with a real person. Just ask a simple question, and the BeezyPDF will answer for you in an instant.

âœï¸ Intelligent interpretation: No need to spend a lot of time reading the entire file, just enter your concern, and BeezyPDF will read and deeply understand the information in the PDF, providing you with professional answers.

ğŸ” Information retrieval artifact: BeezyPDF can find the desired content more quickly. Whether you need to look for specific information in the document or explore related conclusions, it can provide you with efficient search results.

â¤ï¸

ğŸ¤” What is Beezy ?

Beezy chatbot is a super simple and user-friendly ChatGPT assistant.

ğŸ¤” What can Beezy do?

ğŸ Beezy integrates with OpenAI's ChatGPT, providing a super convenient chat feature! ğŸ™ŒğŸ¤©

ğŸYou won't need to login to an OpenAI account or be restricted by account limitations in certain regions. You can chat with ChatGPT anytime, anywhere, and enjoy an easy and fun chat experience. ğŸ¤ğŸ¤“

ğŸ When you want to ask questions to the ChatGPT chatbot, you don't need to leave the current page, you can directly activate the Beezy chatbot.

ğŸ When you want to chat with ChatGPT on a specific topic, Beezy chatbot can remember the context you selected on the current page.

ğŸŒ For more information, please visit https://beezy.cool/.
